entries.title: Update changelog 2025-04-23
entries.whats_new: Multiple updates to the changelog, including fixing bugs, setting up cache storage, and merging branches.
entries.impact: Users will see more accurate and up-to-date changelog entries with improved caching and stability.

entries.title: Update main.py
entries.whats_new: Updated the main Python script to enhance functionality.
entries.impact: Improves the core program performance and features for users.

entries.title: Add some limit on entries
entries.whats_new: Implemented limits on the number of changelog entries displayed or stored.
entries.impact: Prevents overflowing or excessive data, helping users focus on recent changes.

entries.title: Merge branch 'main'
entries.whats_new: Merged latest changes from the main branch.
entries.impact: Ensures the project is synchronized with the latest updates for users.

entries.title: Keep the local generate cache strategy
entries.whats_new: Maintained the approach of generating and storing changelog cache locally.
entries.impact: Users experience faster access to changelog data with local caching.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Updated dependencies for the project.
entries.impact: Ensures compatibility and stability across development environments.

entries.title: Interact with Railway and Github webhook
entries.whats_new: Integrated deployment and webhook functionalities with Railway and GitHub.
entries.impact: Allows automated updates and deployments, improving user workflow.

entries.title: Deploy on Railway Ready
entries.whats_new: Deployment setup completed for Railway hosting platform.
entries.impact: Users can now access the service via Railway hosting environment.

entries.title: Back-end API deploy on Railway Success
entries.whats_new: Successfully deployed backend API to Railway.
entries.impact: Backend services are now available for users.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Further updates to project dependencies.
entries.impact: Improves environment stability and compatibility for users.

entries.title: Python 3.11
entries.whats_new: Updated to support Python 3.11 runtime.
entries.impact: Ensures the project runs with the latest Python features and performance improvements.

entries.title: Create railway.json
entries.whats_new: Configuration file for Railway deployment created.
entries.impact: Facilitates deployment automation on Railway platform.

entries.title: Open Back-end API to other users
entries.whats_new: The backend API is now accessible to external users.
entries.impact: This is a significant change as it allows external access to the API, which may introduce security considerations.

entries.title: Collect interface to src\types.ts
entries.whats_new: Organized interfaces into a single file for better management.
entries.impact: Simplifies code maintenance for developers.

entries.title: Polish Front-end Page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced visual design and added loading effects to the homepage.
entries.impact: Provides users with a more polished and engaging interface.

entries.title: Add more details on the Detail.tsx
entries.whats_new: Enhanced changelog detail page with a floating navbar and additional information.
entries.impact: Changes how details are displayed and navigated, improving user experience but altering previous page behavior.

entries.title: Use json cache strategy to connect front-end and back-end
entries.whats_new: Introduced JSON file caching for faster changelog loading.
entries.impact: This change modifies the data retrieval process, improving load times but requiring cache management.

entries.title: Polish the Sidebar component. Basic layout of ChangelogOverview page
entries.whats_new: Improved sidebar UI and layout for navigation.
entries.impact: Provides better navigation experience for users.

entries.title: Optimize constants to constants/index.tsx file
entries.whats_new: Refactored constants into a dedicated file for easier access.
entries.impact: Makes code cleaner and more maintainable for developers.

entries.title: Front-end layout implementation
entries.whats_new: Built a sidebar navigation system and layout for the project.
entries.impact: This foundational change alters how users interact with the interface, introducing new navigation patterns.

entries.title: Basic front-end web implementation
entries.whats_new: Developed a user-facing website to display changelogs with automatic content generation.
entries.impact: This introduces a new front-end system for users, replacing previous manual methods and enhancing experience.

entries.title: Update the llm and schemas
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the language model support to detect auto-finding breaking changes.
entries.impact: Advanced API capabilities that automatically identify breaking commits, improving changelog accuracy.

entries.title: Second version of LLM, delete cache
entries.whats_new: Updated the language model to a new version and removed cache files.
entries.impact: Improves accuracy of change detection for users.

entries.title: Update git ignore
entries.whats_new: Refined .gitignore for better repository management.
entries.impact: Prevents unwanted files from being tracked, aiding developers.

entries.title: Basic back-end api implemented
entries.whats_new: Initial backend API development completed.
entries.impact: Allows the system to handle data requests from users.

entries.title: Initialize app
entries.whats_new: Set up the initial application structure.
entries.impact: Enables further development and deployment.
